recipe_list.name: Grilled Cheese
instructions: Place 1 cheddar cheese slice between two bread slices.
In a pan over medium heat, grill the sandwich until the bread is golden and the cheese is melted.

recipe_list.name: Steak
instructions: Preheat a pan over high heat.
Season the steak with salt and black pepper on both sides.
Place the steak on the pan and cook to your preferred doneness.
